title: FS/FT T206 Herbie Moran Sovereign   SOLD
author: Rich Falvo

posts.post_title: FS/FT T206 Herbie Moran Sovereign   SOLD
posts.post_content:
Recently upgraded, so this Herbie Moran Sovereign is available.  Some light creasing and normal corner wear. Looking for $32 dlvd.  Pay via PayPal f/f.

Will also consider trades for similar-condition Sovereigns of Providence players  Anderson, Blackburne, Hoffman, Lavender, or Shaw.

Please PM with questions.

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=268197&d=1491182730[/IMG][IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=268198&d=1491182734[/IMG]

I'll take it!  PM coming...

Cheers,
Geno
